doc.title: Mr. & Mrs. Goswami (The Bahurupies)
doc.plot: The Bahurupy are people who entertain others by many forms of acts, in disguising themselves as others. The people are well entertained. Sampa and Mithun Goswami, performs this act together, and lives a happy life. The film captures some of the couple's acts and their views on the profession, and on their future.
